message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product that I believe will be a great asset for you.  I'm offering it to you at a price of $11,500.  Let me know what you think!
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate the value you're placing on this product, but I'm looking to pay closer to $10,500.  Let me know if that works for you.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $10,500 is simply too low. I'm prepared to accept $11,000 for the product. Let's see if we can reach a compromise.
